content: For the fiscal first quarter, Investment Management reported total revenue of $1.9 million compared to $1.0 million during the same period in the prior year. For the quarter, Investment Management reported a net loss of $6.0 million in comparison to a net loss of $0.1 million in the prior year period. For the fiscal first quarter, Great Elm's General Corporate segment recorded $200,000 in revenue compared to $240,000 during the same period in the prior year. For the fiscal first quarter of 2023, General Corporate reported a net loss of $9.3 million compared to a loss of $1.8 million in the prior year quarter.
